title: Successful phone number OTP login
description: Verify that a user can input a valid phone number, receive an OTP, enter the correct OTP, and successfully authenticate to the home screen.

steps.description: Open the app and navigate to the phone number login screen.
Enter a valid phone number and submit.
Wait to receive an OTP code.
Enter the received OTP code on the verification screen.
User is successfully authenticated and redirected to the home screen.

title: Invalid phone number input handling
description: Check that the login screen validates phone number format and shows appropriate error messages for invalid inputs.

steps.description: Navigate to the phone number login screen.
Input an invalid phone number (e.g., letters, too short, or too long) and submit.
Validate that a relevant error message displays preventing submission.

title: Incorrect OTP verification fails
description: Verify that entering an incorrect OTP code results in appropriate error notification and no authentication.

steps.description: Enter a valid phone number to trigger OTP sending.
Enter an incorrect OTP code on the verification screen.
Check that an error message is shown and user remains on OTP verification screen.

title: Multi-page onboarding flow completion
description: Ensure user can navigate through all onboarding pages with animated transitions and that completion status is stored.

steps.description: Launch the app for the first time and view the onboarding screens.
Navigate through all onboarding pages via next buttons observing animations.
Complete the onboarding by reaching the final page.
Onboarding completion status is saved locally.
Restart the app.
User is routed past onboarding to login screen directly.

title: Onboarding skip functionality
description: Verify that users can skip the onboarding flow and that skip state is persisted so onboarding does not show again.

steps.description: Open the app on first launch.
Press the skip button on the onboarding screens.
User is redirected to the login screen.
Restart the app.
Onboarding screens do not show and user is routed to login.

title: Home screen service category display
description: Validate that the home screen displays exactly 12 predefined service categories in a grid as expected.

steps.description: Authenticate and land on the home screen.
Verify a grid layout exists showing 12 service categories: Plumber, Electrician, Cleaning, Mechanic, Hair/Beauty, Painting, Moving, Gardening, Tech Repair, Laundry, Delivery, Vet/Pet.

title: Home screen search functionality with valid input
description: Validate that user can enter keywords in the search bar to find matching services.

steps.description: On home screen, enter a valid service keyword in the search bar.
Submit the search query.
Results relevant to the search query are displayed.

title: Home screen search with no matching results
description: Verify that entering search terms with no matching services shows appropriate empty state or message.

steps.description: Enter a search query with no matching services.
Submit the search.
Check that a 'No results found' message or equivalent empty state is displayed.

title: Profile update persists new full name
description: Verify that a user can update their full name in profile and the change is saved and reflected on subsequent app launches.

steps.description: Navigate to the profile section.
Update the full name field with a new valid name.
Save the profile changes.
Updated name is shown in profile immediately.
Restart the app and navigate to profile.
The updated full name persists and is displayed.

title: Profile update handles invalid inputs gracefully
description: Check that invalid profile input (e.g., empty name) is rejected with proper validation messages.

steps.description: Go to profile edit screen.
Clear or enter invalid input in full name field.
Attempt to save changes.
Validation error is shown and changes are not saved.

title: Service list fetched and sorted alphabetically
description: Verify that the services fetched from the backend are displayed in alphabetical order on service lists or provider dashboards.

steps.description: Access service list or provider dashboard screen.
Services are displayed sorted alphabetically by their name.

title: Admin dashboard loads with platform data
description: Ensure admin users accessing the admin dashboard can see relevant platform management data loaded correctly.

steps.description: Login as an admin user.
Navigate to the admin dashboard.
Relevant platform data like user stats, services, bookings are fetched and displayed correctly without errors.

title: Provider dashboard service and bookings management
description: Verify service providers can view their services and bookings and perform management operations as expected.

steps.description: Login as a service provider.
Go to the provider dashboard screen.
Service list and booking data are loaded correctly.
Perform standard management actions permitted (e.g., view booking details).
Actions complete without errors and UI updates accordingly.

title: Zellij background renders correctly across different screen sizes
description: Validate the custom Moroccan Zellij tile background renders consistently and without distortion across multiple device resolutions and orientations.

steps.description: Open the app home screen on multiple devices or emulators with different screen sizes.
Check that the Zellij background pattern is rendered fully, with correct proportions, no clipping or misalignment.
Rotate devices between portrait and landscape.
Zellij background adapts to orientation changes maintaining visual consistency.

title: Application theme colors and typography load correctly
description: Verify the Moroccan-inspired Material Design 3 theme, gradients, and Google Fonts text styling load correctly and consistently throughout the app.

steps.description: Launch the app and navigate through all major screens.
Check that the color palette (red, blue, yellow, green) applies properly to UI components such as buttons, text, banners, and navigation.
Validate that Google Fonts used for texts render properly without fallback fonts.

title: App initialization correctly sets up Supabase and routes user
description: Verify the app initializes Supabase client properly, sets up provider-based state management, and routes user based on onboarding and authentication state.

steps.description: Launch app on a fresh install (no onboarding completed, no login).
User is routed to onboarding screens.
Complete onboarding and launch again.
User is routed to login screen.
Simulate a logged-in user session and relaunch app.
User is routed directly to home screen.
